code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AcceptedOrders(){const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/orders',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(response=>setOrders(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error(error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Accepted Orders"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:order.description},order.id))})]});}export default AcceptedOrders;
